item.description:
Pot Luck Supper Club

What is a Pot Luck Supper Club?

A group that meets once a month, once a week, or once in a while. We can decide how often we want to meet. As the weather get's warmer we can have BBQ's, etc. We can also have themes such as Italian Style, Mexican, Greek, Chinese, etc.

For the first one lets keep it simple. Everyone Bring a Dish: Main Course, Salad, Side, or a Dessert.

So we won't repeat what others are bringing and so we won't all bring something in the same category, please add a note when you reserve what type of course you are bringing and what it is!

It's limited to 10 women so bring enough according to the type of course you are providing!

3 Women Choose Main Courses: Chicken, Beef, Casserole, Etc. We need 2 more!


3 Women Choose Sides: Potatoes, Rice, Veggies. We need 2 more!


I have coffee and tea, otherwise BYOB!

Thanks Geri for the suggestion!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Pot Luck Supper Club
